ack.p: We acknowledge the World Climate Research Programme's Working Group on Coupled Modelling, which is responsible for CMIP, and we thank the climate modelling groups (listed in Supplementary Table 1 of this paper) for producing and making available their model output. This work was supported by Natural Environment Research Council National Capability funding to S.A.H. Contributions of T.I. and R.S. were supported by EU H2020 project CRESCENDO (grant 641816). Contribution of J.L.S. was supported by BP under the Princeton Carbon Mitigation Initiative. Contribution of JT was supported by Bjerknes Centre (BIGCHANGE) and RCN (no. 239965).
